title: Destination of Crybird - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance   Seinen   Tragedy
tags: Age Progression   Character Growth   Cheats   Death of Loved Ones   Demi-Humans   Demons   Elves   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Magic   Male Protagonist   Medieval   Monsters   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Wars   Weak to Strong
author: 洋之東西
description:
A young man who struggled with all his might, but instead was crushed by the limits of his own talent finally gave up on becoming a top ranked person and lost his life dramatically.

This man was born into a different world called Riiguyuuru (リーグユール) that has concepts such as magic, skills and levels as Rarukusu Kuraibaado (ラルクス・クライバード) / Larks Crybird with the memories of his previous life. He was born with a unique skill that allows him to possess any skills in existence by putting in effort. Rarukusu once again started to live there, while aiming to be the strongest.

However in this world, there are countless monsters that can not be beaten by merely relying on swordsmanship or magic. Currently monsters are quite aggressive and humanity is slowly declining. In such a world how will Rarukusu / L’arc , who keeps aiming to be the strongest while faltering from time to time, end up?>
